thread.title: Watch ESPN's 'GameDay' tribute to retired Head Ball Coach Steve Spurrier
thread.title_full: Watch ESPN's 'GameDay' tribute to retired Head Ball Coach Steve Spurrier

author: Cheryl Wray | cwray@al.com
title: Watch ESPN's 'GameDay' tribute to retired Head Ball Coach Steve Spurrier
text:
Comments 
On the first Saturday in decades that Steve Spurrier isn't coaching a college football game, ESPN's 'GameDay' program welcomed the former Head Ball Coach to its set. 
It also shared a special video tribute to the coach, in which he is seen talking in his trademark twang about the quality of his teams ("we had another sorry practice"), fellow coaches ("everybody doesn't like me"), fellow teams ("somebody told me nobody had ever scored 50 against Georgia here, and we wanted to score 50") and the SEC ("winning the SEC probably is harder than winning a national championship"). 
Watch the video here:
